mapper.insert: INSERT INTO thunder (region, tag, writer, title, header, start_date, end_date, content, media, trail, hiking_time, hiking_dist) VALUES(#{region}, #{tag}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{header}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{content}, #{media}, #{trail}, #{hikingTime}, #{hikingDist})
